properties.areaDesc: Coastal Chatham; Beaufort; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley; Charleston; Inland Chatham; Dorchester; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Bryan; Inland Colleton; Inland Berkeley; Coastal Jasper
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 2 at 1:15PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
A tight gradient between offshore high pressure and a cold front
far inland over the Ohio Valley and Midwest, will result in south
and southwest winds of 20-30 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph at
times. The strongest winds will be inland from Route 17 over the
coastal counties through late afternoon.

Winds on some of the taller bridges may be even stronger. This
includes, the Ravenel Bridge, the Don Holt Bridge, the James B.
Edwards Bridge, the Ben Sawyer Bridge, the Isle of Palms
connector, the Amos Nathaniel Rodgers Bridge, the Woods Memorial
Bridge and the Talmadge Memorial Bridge.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio All Hazards or the Internet for
the latest information from the National Weather Service.

NWSheadline: STRONG WINDS IN MANY AREAS EAST OF INTERSTATE 95 THIS AFTERNOON
